## getDateTimeRangeFrom() function

Parses the string and returns a DateTimeRange object.

Supports both the ISO-8601 range &amp; "--<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->" style date range.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getDateTimeRangeFrom(date: string): DateTimeRange | undefined;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | string |  |
